title: SpectraBall 2008 - Working Version - READ Notes by Tav0
description:
Spectraball combines elements of platforming, puzzle solving, addictive gameplay, and stunning visuals to deliver an experience that sets a new standard for the genre. In addition, Spectraball utilizes Steamworks, offering full support for achievements and stat tracking.

* Roll, jump, and launch your way through several diverse environments
* Addictive, fast-paced gameplay
* Online leaderboards
* Achievement system
* Gameplay stats
* Earn points to unlock new abilities, maps, mini-games and skins
* Enjoy free content updates that include new maps, abilities, mini-games, zones and achievements
* Engage in some quick fun with a variety of mini-games
* Xbox 360 controller support <a href="
http://www.flashcubestudios.com/projects/spectraball/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.flashcubestudios.com/projects/spectraball/</a>

     o DirectXÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Version: DirectXÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 9.0 or higher
     o Sound: Direct X 9.0 compliant
     o Hard Drive: 360 MB

INSTALL NOTES

Instructions:

1.Install Steam and create an account if you dont have one.
2.Download the game and extract files to C: >Games > Steam > steamapps > common > spectraball
3.Install PhysX_Game_installer_281 found in the PhysX folder
4.Create a shortcut for the game(spectraball.exe)
5.Start steam and then play the game(you cannot start the game from steam). STEAM HAS TO BE RUNNING.

So far ONLY FREE PLAY WORKS (all levels but no time limit)
